title: # 508 - Trevor Wallace & ME
itunes:title: # 508 - Trevor Wallace & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, Trevor Wallace. We talk about all of his viral videos, how much he spends on his videos, getting clocked by a bouncer, partying, his theater tour, and much more!

 

Check out his podcast “Still Socks” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/stiff-socks/id1449678510 

 

Follow Trevor

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/trevorwallace 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/trevwall 

 

This episode is brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is brought to you by Famous Smoke Shop. Go to http://www.famous-smoke.com and use the code “Bert t save $20 off your purchase of $100 or more.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon earbuds. Get 15% off your order at www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERTCAST” at checkout for 25% off your first order 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs. Enter promo code “BERT” and get a free Whistle Tip Football at http://www.birddogs.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
